title: Star Guardian Homeguard Bug
body:
So I have every single Star Guardian skin and when I played the new skin line characters, some of their homeguards looked bugged and some didn't. The ones that were bugged had their bodies are shining in a bright color and it only applies to Syndra, Ezreal, and Miss Fortune. Ahri and Soraka looked fine so I was just wondering if the team noticed this and if they have, wondered if they are going to fix it. Thank you for looking into this!! btw love the skins thank you for doing such a great job!! <3

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

These are screenshots of Syndra, Ezreal, and Miss Fortune
https://imgur.com/hvVvs81
https://imgur.com/Z3Sa9Uj
https://imgur.com/kM4Wie6

Screenshots of Ahri and Soraka
https://imgur.com/BMFjWri
https://imgur.com/vFQwC16

replies.body:
Hi Arrior! 

I'm checking everything on PBE (which is what'll be going live next patch), and I'm not able to repro this issue on my machine. If you're seeing this next patch, please let me know - ping me in this thread! 

https://imgur.com/iQwqgdX

Out of curiosity, what are your graphics settings?

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Sorry for responding late Katey,

My graphics settings are on the lowest settings (I actually don't know why it isðŸ¤”) and I think that was the problem, I went into a custom and changed it to the highest possible settings (my fps also somehow was still the same) and the home guard looked fine!! Thanks for the help and the advice you the best!

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

https://imgur.com/a/EWPu7
